competitors.name: Qualys
competitors.notes: Most direct rival in vulnerability and exposure management, cloud-based platform

competitors.name: Rapid7 InsightVM
competitors.notes: Cloud-based successor to Nexpose with risk prioritization

competitors.name: Wiz
competitors.notes: Cloud security emphasizing simplicity and Kubernetes support

competitors.name: Orca Security
competitors.notes: Agentless CNAPP for cloud-first exposure management

context: By 2020, Tenable had 24,000+ customers including 50%+ of Fortune 500. Traditional competitors remained strong while cloud-native competitors like Wiz, Aqua Security, Orca Security emerged. Tenable rated first in accuracy and coverage though noted for limited remediation capabilities.
